metadata.description: How deeply you connect emotionally - whether you truly 'get' each other's feelings

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Moon-Moon aspects show emotional rhythm. Moon-Venus shows care style alignment. Neptune adds depth or illusion.

planet_meanings.Venus: love style and what you value

very_low.label: Shut Off
very_low.guidance: They struggle to reach each other emotionally; validate the loneliness and warn against expecting deep support here.

low.label: Mismatched
low.guidance: Feel things on different wavelengths; talk about understanding each other's style, may stay uneven.

mid.label: Surface-Deep
mid.guidance: Some depth but not automatic; emotional closeness grows if both make effort.

high.label: Warm
high.guidance: Generally 'get' each other's feelings; encourage honest sharing.

very_high.label: Soul-Level
very_high.guidance: Strong emotional resonance; describe feeling deeply seen, handle intensity with care.
